thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Porte de Versailles Expo - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Vanves, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent view from the room
thread.title_full: Excellent view from the room - Review of Mercure Paris Porte de Versailles Expo, Vanves, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tibor T
title: Excellent view from the room
text: I have stayed two nights in the hotel. The location is fantastic if you visit the Expo building, only a few minutes walk from the hotel. If you want to visit the main touristic points of the city, you need roughly 40 minutes. From my room the Eifel towel was clearly seen, very nice lighted in evenings. The hotel is a bit dated, most of the emloyees were friendly and helpful.
